# Government Tender Announcement: Services for Use of Force Scenarios in CBSA Training Facility
## Objective
The Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) is seeking professional stunt-actors and/or certified use of force instructors to participate in use of force scenarios involving Border Services Officers (BSOs) and recruits at the CBSA training facility in Rigaud, Quebec.

## Contract Details
- **Title:** Provision of Professional Stunt-actors and/or Certified Instructors in Use of Force Scenario-Based Training
- **Reference Number:** PW-22-01013971
- **Solicitation Number:** 1000411204
- **Publication Date:** November 18, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2022, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Standard Time)

## Geographical Scope
This tender is open to contractors based in Quebec (except for the National Capital Region (NCR)).

## Trade Agreements
This contract is subject to the following trade agreements:
- Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
- World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
- Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
- Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
- Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
- Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
- Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
- Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
- Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
